type="application/json" id="page-kit-bootstrap-config">{"trackErrors":true,"core":["https://polyfill.io/v3/polyfill.min.js?features=HTMLPictureElement&source=next"],"enhanced":["https://polyfill.io/v3/polyfill.min.js?features=default%2Ces5%2Ces2015%2Ces2016%2Ces2017%2CEventSource%2Cfetch%2CHTMLPictureElement%2CIntersectionObserver%2CNodeList.prototype.forEach&source=next","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/webpack-runtime.fb5e068cad11.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/page-kit-components.1513323d75c9.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/n-myft-ui.506bd9890081.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/n-messaging-client.21bcd86c6377.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-o-tracking.48d47e20d695.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/shared.volatile.e8874674a93c.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-o-ads.c2b9ee43b40b.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-n-native-ads.6adb523e9280.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/shared.stable.a410812d20e5.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/n-swg.e56874b5cf62.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-video.51b170f9f3b0.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/next-myft-client.7b681e546bc8.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-header.47d6ad5a01e0.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/n-topic-card.496a7450a772.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-forms.0ac59ba9dd66.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/n-notification.84cea8e6e685.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/next-session-client.a488dae6869c.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-footer.f8c5b0331de8.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-message.7d66f9791bc4.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-overlay.7f2be735bc80.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-toggle.f52b14d8ca91.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-tooltip.0491ae6a5c08.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-banner.31b55c6582f1.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-lazy-load.0bd1cfa49a56.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-share.cdde6b3a175c.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-typography.40be387e4e4a.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-viewport.3df8aac743cd.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/superstore.0c70d59fdcef.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-o-viewport.aacbdaca2385.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-x-engine.1b678911ef33.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-date.6c2d8994db80.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-grid.80dbe6cd6af0.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-layers.1f9711dad6b6.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/o-utils.ebe34c02de08.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-o-grid.e04e56034e9e.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-o-utils.039203628d34.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-x-follow-button.5c6aa25e497f.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/financial-times-x-teaser.d58db1a0d4ca.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/dateformat.ce5de49b0b4a.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/preact.e86a1201c568.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/regenerator-runtime.70d47c89378b.bundle.js","https://www.ft.com/__assets/hashed/page-kit/scripts.ddc885e0a467.bundle.js"]}</script><script>;(function () {
  var doc = document.documentElement
  var isEnhanced = isEnhancedBrowser()
  var scriptsConfig = getScriptsConfig()
  var scriptsToLoad = []
  var currentScript = document.scripts[document.scripts.length - 1]

  doc.className = doc.className.replace('no-js', 'js')

  if (isEnhanced) {
    doc.className = doc.className.replace('core', 'enhanced')
    Array.prototype.push.apply(scriptsToLoad, scriptsConfig.enhanced)
  } else {
    Array.prototype.push.apply(scriptsToLoad, scriptsConfig.core)
  }

  for (var i = 0, len = scriptsToLoad.length; i < len; i++) {
    loadScript(scriptsToLoad[i])
  }

  function scriptLoadError(error) {
    var script = error.target ? error.target.src : null

    if (script) {
      console.error('The script ' + script + ' failed to load') // eslint-disable-line no-console
    }

    if (/enhanced/.test(doc.className)) {
      console.warn('Script loading failed, reverting to core experience') // eslint-disable-line no-console
      doc.className = doc.className.replace('enhanced', 'core')
    }

    if (scriptsConfig.trackErrors) {
      addErrorTrackingPixel(script)
    }
  }

  function loadScript(src) {
    var script = document.createElement('script')
    script.onerror = scriptLoadError
    script.async = false
    script.src = src
    currentScript.parentNode.insertBefore(script, currentScript)
  }

  // "Cut the mustard" test
  // by Maggie Allen and Matt Hinchliffe November 2018
  function isEnhancedBrowser() {
    var script = document.createElement('script')
    var input = document.createElement('input')

    return (
      'visibilityState' in document && // not supported by old Android (4.0-4.4) without a prefix
      'indeterminate' in input && // not supported by BB 10
      'flex' in doc.style && // not supported by old Safari (< 9) or IE 6-10
      'async' in script // not supported by old Opera (Presto engine < 15)
    )
  }

  function getScriptsConfig() {
    var scriptsConfigEl = document.getElementById('page-kit-bootstrap-config')
    var scriptsConfig = { core: [], enhanced: [], trackErrors: false }

    if (scriptsConfigEl) {
      try {
        scriptsConfig = JSON.parse(scriptsConfigEl.innerHTML)
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Bootstrap configuration error', error) // eslint-disable-line no-console
      }
    }

    return scriptsConfig
  }

  function addErrorTrackingPixel(script) {
    var img = new Image()

    var data = JSON.stringify({
      category: 'javascript',
      action: 'load-error',
      system: {
        source: 'page-kit'
      },
      context: {
        script: script
      }
    })

    img.src = 'https://spoor-api.ft.com/px.gif?data=' + encodeURIComponent(data)
  }
})()
</script><script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
          new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
            j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
            'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
        })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-NWQJW68');</script><script>(function loadCustomFonts() {
    var rootElement = document.documentElement;
    if (/(^|\s)o-typography-fonts-loaded=1(;|$)/.test(document.cookie)) {
        var fontLabels = ['sans', 'sans-bold', 'display', 'display-bold'];
        for (var i = 0; i < fontLabels.length; i++) {
            rootElement.className = rootElement.className.replace('o-typography--loading-' + fontLabels[i], '');
        }
    }
}());</script></head><body><noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-NWQJW68" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript><div class="n-layout"><a data-trackable="a11y-skip-to-help" class="n-layout__skip-link" href="https://www.ft.com/accessibility">Accessibility help</a><a data-trackable="a11y-skip-to-navigation" class="n-layout__skip-link" href="#site-navigation">Skip to navigation</a><a data-trackable="a11y-skip-to-content" class="n-layout__skip-link" href="#site-content">Skip to content</a><a data-trackable="a11y-skip-to-footer" class="n-layout__skip-link" href="#site-footer">Skip to footer</a><div class="n-layout__row n-layout__row--header"><div class="n-layout__header-before"><div class="o-ads o-ads--center o-ads--background o-ads--transition o-ads--reserve-90 above-header-advert" data-o-ads-name="leaderboard" data-o-ads-targeting="pos=top" data-o-ads-formats-medium="Leaderboard,Responsive" data-o-ads-formats-large="SuperLeaderboard,Leaderboard,Responsive" data-o-ads-formats-extra="Billboard,SuperLeaderboard,Leaderboard,Responsive"></div><div

				role="dialog"
				aria-labelledby="cookie-banner-aria-label" aria-describedby="cookie-banner-aria-description">
			<div class="o-banner n-messaging-client-messaging-banner

				>
				<div class="o-banner__outer">
							<h2 class="cookie-banner__head" id="cookie-banner-aria-label">Cookies on FT Sites</h2>
				<div class="cookie-banner__inner" data-o-banner-inner="" data-o-banner-inner="">
					<div id="cookie-banner-aria-description">We use <a href="http://help.ft.com/help/legal-privacy/cookies/" class="cookie-banner__link cookie-banner__link--external" data-o-banner-action data-o-banner-action-type="view-policy" target="_blank" rel="noopener">cookies<span class="o-normalise-visually-hidden"> (opens in new window)</span></a> for a number of reasons, such as keeping FT Sites reliable and secure, personalising content and ads, providing social media features and to analyse how our Sites are used.</div>
					<div class="cookie-banner__actions">
						<div>
							<a class="cookie-banner__link" href="https://www.ft.com/preferences/manage-cookies" data-o-banner-action data-o-banner-action-type="manage">Manage cookies</a>

						</div>

				</div>
			</div>
	</div><header id="site-navigation" class="o-header o-header--large-logo" data-o-component="o-header" data-o-header--no-js="true" tabindex="-1"><div class="o-header__row o-header__anon" 	<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M3">
				<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small o-teaser--stacked o-teaser--has-image o-teaser--live js-teaser" data-id="a761b829-377f-3225-9773-754065843a3d"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/coronavirus" aria-label="Category: Coronavirus pandemic">Coronavirus pandemic</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/a761b829-377f-3225-9773-754065843a3d" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">Coronavirus latest: Gilead to trial inhaler version of Covid treatment</a></div><div class="o-teaser__timestamp o-teaser__timestamp--live"><span class="o-teaser__timestamp-prefix">Live</span></div></div><div class="o-teaser__image-container js-teaser-image-container"><div class="o-teaser__image-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:56.2500%;"><a href="/content/a761b829-377f-3225-9773-754065843a3d" data-trackable="image-link" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"><img class="o-teaser__image" src="https://www.ft.com/__origami/service/image/v2/images/raw/http%3A%2F%2Fblogs.ft.com%2Fthe-world%2Ffiles%2F2020%2F06%2Fredesivir-lab_2048x1152.jpg?source=next&amp;fit=scale-down&amp;compression=best&amp;width=240" alt=""/></a></div></div></div>
	</div>
	<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M3">
				<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small o-teaser--stacked o-teaser--has-image js-teaser" data-id="2581fda5-8c89-46b5-9acf-ba8a88d74d88"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><span class="o-teaser__tag-prefix">FT Investigations</span><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/content/bb22e179-cf1b-42d8-8d55-969bb177013c" aria-label="Category: Inside Wirecard">Inside Wirecard</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/2581fda5-8c89-46b5-9acf-ba8a88d74d88" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">Wirecard fights for survival as it admits scale of fraud</a></div><p class="o-teaser__standfirst"><a href="/content/2581fda5-8c89-46b5-9acf-ba8a88d74d88" data-trackable="standfirst-link" tabindex="-1" class="js-teaser-standfirst-link">Police open probe and regulator says affair is ‘a shame’ for Germany as payments group withdraws previous results </a></p><div class="o-teaser__timestamp o-teaser__timestamp--"><time class="o-teaser__timestamp-date o-date" data-o-component="o-date" data-o-date-format="time-ago-limit-4-hours" datetime="2020-06-22T17:11:28+0000">3 hours ago</time></div></div><div class="o-teaser__image-container js-teaser-image-container"><div class="o-teaser__image-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:56.2500%;"><a href="/content/2581fda5-8c89-46b5-9acf-ba8a88d74d88" data-trackable="image-link" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"><img class="o-teaser__image" src="https://www.ft.com/__origami/service/image/v2/images/raw/https%3A%2F%2Fd1e00ek4ebabms.cloudfront.net%2Fproduction%2F348946ba-d246-426e-8cc4-9728a240d9d7.jpg?source=next&amp;fit=scale-down&amp;compression=best&amp;width=240" alt=""/></a></div></div></div>
	</div>
	<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M3">

			<section class="o-teaser-collection o-teaser-collection--special js-track-scroll-event" data-trackable="special-event">
	<div class="o-teaser-collection__heading-container">
				<h2 class="o-teaser-collection__heading">
					<span class="section-heading__text">
							<a href="/coronavirus" data-trackable="section-title">Coronavirus Pandemic</a>
					</span>
				</h2>
				<form
					class="n-myft-ui n-myft-ui--follow "

				</form>
	</div>
	<div class="o-grid-row">
		<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 L4">
					<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--large o-teaser--has-image js-teaser" data-id="aaa2c3cd-eea6-4cfa-a918-9eb7d1c230f4"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><span class="o-teaser__tag-prefix">Analysis</span><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/stream/bd89df59-1c96-4bb4-856c-823bd4dcb4b1" aria-label="Category: UK Inequality">UK Inequality</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/aaa2c3cd-eea6-4cfa-a918-9eb7d1c230f4" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">How Somalis in east London were hit by the pandemic</a></div><p class="o-teaser__standfirst"><a href="/content/aaa2c3cd-eea6-4cfa-a918-9eb7d1c230f4" data-trackable="standfirst-link" tabindex="-1" class="js-teaser-standfirst-link">Community’s experience fits the pattern of Bame groups suffering disproportionately</a></p></div><div class="o-teaser__image-container js-teaser-image-container"><div class="o-teaser__image-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:56.2500%;"><a href="/content/aaa2c3cd-eea6-4cfa-a918-9eb7d1c230f4" data-trackable="image-link" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"><img class="o-teaser__image" src="https://www.ft.com/__origami/service/image/v2/images/raw/https%3A%2F%2Fd1e00ek4ebabms.cloudfront.net%2Fproduction%2Fc0e4f9e2-3ffa-49aa-9760-c7c4354efe2b.jpg?source=next&amp;fit=scale-down&amp;compression=best&amp;width=340" alt=""/></a></div></div></div>
		</div>

		<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M6 L4">
					<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small js-teaser" data-id="a26fbf7e-48f8-11ea-aeb3-955839e06441"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/content/844ed71e-6d06-11ea-89df-41bea055720b" aria-label="Category: Coronavirus: free to read">Coronavirus: free to read</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/a26fbf7e-48f8-11ea-aeb3-955839e06441" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">Coronavirus tracked: the latest figures as countries fight to contain the pandemic</a></div><p class="o-teaser__standfirst"><a href="/content/a26fbf7e-48f8-11ea-aeb3-955839e06441" data-trackable="standfirst-link" tabindex="-1" class="js-teaser-standfirst-link">The FT analyses the scale of outbreaks and the number of deaths around the world</a></p><div class="o-teaser__timestamp o-teaser__timestamp--"><time class="o-teaser__timestamp-date o-date" data-o-component="o-date" data-o-date-format="time-ago-limit-4-hours" datetime="2020-06-22T17:54:50+0000">2 hours ago</time></div></div></div>
					<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small js-teaser" data-id="7ecd5ded-9b90-4052-b849-0e153f701e1f"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/content/844ed71e-6d06-11ea-89df-41bea055720b" aria-label="Category: Coronavirus: free to read">Coronavirus: free to read</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/7ecd5ded-9b90-4052-b849-0e153f701e1f" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">Coronavirus: Sweden starts to debate its public health experiment</a></div><p class="o-teaser__standfirst"><a href="/content/7ecd5ded-9b90-4052-b849-0e153f701e1f" data-trackable="standfirst-link" tabindex="-1" class="js-teaser-standfirst-link">The Nordic country has tried to stay as open as possible but with rising deaths its policy faces growing scrutiny</a></p></div></div>
		</div>

		<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M6 L4">
					<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small js-teaser" data-id="7498eb28-231d-4aaf-b85a-c38502a476d2"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/7498eb28-231d-4aaf-b85a-c38502a476d2" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">Kudlow dismisses ‘second wave’ fears as US cases jump</a></div></div></div>

				<div id="myft-low" data-section-container="myft-low"></div>

			<section class="o-teaser-collection js-track-scroll-event o-teaser-collection--life-arts" data-trackable="life-and-arts">
			<h2 class="o-teaser-collection__heading">
				<span class="section-heading__text">
						<a href="/life-arts" data-trackable="section-title">Life & Arts</a>
				</span>
			</h2>
	<div class="o-grid-row">
		<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M6">
					<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small o-teaser--stacked o-teaser--has-image js-teaser" data-id="b6e9640c-b471-11ea-b5d9-84704a744f61"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><span class="o-teaser__tag-prefix">Review</span><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/music" aria-label="Category: Music">Music</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/b6e9640c-b471-11ea-b5d9-84704a744f61" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">OperaVision’s summer gala gives hints of a return to normality</a></div></div><div class="o-teaser__image-container js-teaser-image-container"><div class="o-teaser__image-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:56.2500%;"><a href="/content/b6e9640c-b471-11ea-b5d9-84704a744f61" data-trackable="image-link" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"><img class="o-teaser__image o-lazy-load" data-src="https://www.ft.com/__origami/service/image/v2/images/raw/http%3A%2F%2Fprod-upp-image-read.ft.com%2Fd4357e38-b485-11ea-8ecb-0994e384dffe?source=next&amp;fit=scale-down&amp;compression=best&amp;width=420" alt=""/></a></div></div></div>
		</div>
		<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M6">
					<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--article o-teaser--small o-teaser--stacked o-teaser--has-image js-teaser" data-id="ed52c7a2-b158-11ea-a4b6-31f1eedf762e"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><span class="o-teaser__tag-prefix">Review</span><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/non-fiction" aria-label="Category: Non-Fiction">Non-Fiction</a></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/content/ed52c7a2-b158-11ea-a4b6-31f1eedf762e" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link">Summer books of 2020: Food and drink</a></div><div class="o-teaser__timestamp o-teaser__timestamp--"><time class="o-teaser__timestamp-date o-date" data-o-component="o-date" data-o-date-format="time-ago-limit-4-hours" datetime="2020-06-22T16:43:53+0000">3 hours ago</time></div></div><div class="o-teaser__image-container js-teaser-image-container"><div class="o-teaser__image-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:56.2500%;"><a href="/content/ed52c7a2-b158-11ea-a4b6-31f1eedf762e" data-trackable="image-link" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"><img class="o-teaser__image o-lazy-load" data-src="https://www.ft.com/__origami/service/image/v2/images/raw/http%3A%2F%2Fprod-upp-image-read.ft.com%2Fea723012-b433-11ea-8ecb-0994e384dffe?source=next&amp;fit=scale-down&amp;compression=best&amp;width=420" alt=""/></a></div></div></div>

		<div data-o-grid-colspan="12 M6 L4">

	</div>
</section>

										<div class="o-teaser o-teaser--video o-teaser--small o-teaser--playlist-item o-teaser--has-image js-teaser" data-id="8aa052ee-cbb9-467b-81c8-8a1e154eeae9"><div class="o-teaser__content"><div class="o-teaser__meta"><span class="o-teaser__tag-prefix">Analysis</span><a class="o-teaser__tag" data-trackable="teaser-tag" href="/reports/ft-general-counsel" aria-label="Category: Law">Law</a><span class="o-teaser__tag-suffix">9 min</span></div><div class="o-teaser__heading"><a href="/video/8aa052ee-cbb9-467b-81c8-8a1e154eeae9" data-trackable="heading-link" class="js-teaser-heading-link" aria-label="Watch video Opinion: David Allen Green&#39;s guided tour of UK stop and search law">Opinion: David Allen Green&#39;s guided tour of UK stop and search law</a></div></div><div class="o-teaser__image-container js-teaser-image-container"><div class="o-teaser__image-placeholder" style="padding-bottom:56.2500%;"><a href="/video/8aa052ee-cbb9-467b-81c8-8a1e154eeae9" data-trackable="image-link" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"><img class="o-teaser__image o-lazy-load" data-src="https://www.ft.com/__origami/service/image/v2/images/raw/http%3A%2F%2Fprod-upp-image-read.ft.com%2F02a2650d-0855-4dca-aa64-b8daeeb95d47?source=next&amp;fit=scale-down&amp;compression=best&amp;width=240" alt=""/></a></div></div></div>
								</div>
								<div class="video-section__item">

								</div>
								<div class="video-section__item">
